name: Stunt Doubles
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Spawn up to 3 more of you in radius; each of you is the same hero, except when actions are performed. If defeated, remove all of you.

name: Stunted Doubles
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: Spawn up to 3 more of you in radius; each of you is the same hero, except when actions are performed. If defeated, remove all of you.

name: Crowd Control
text:
When used as a defense action, +2 ::defense::
Defense for each other one of you in radius.
When used as a skill action, remove all other you in play.

name: Phantom Strike
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If there is more than one of you in play, you may remove one of you.

name: Tightrope
text: After you move, you may move another one of you 1 space.

name: Alleyoop
text:
Swap with a friendly hero in range.
Move another one of you up to 1 space.

name: Hit and Gone
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may remove one or more of you in play, except the last one of you.

name: Rummage
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: If there is another one of you in radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.
_(All of you share cards in hand, deck, and discard.)_

name: High Wire
text: After you move, move another one of you up to 2 spaces.

name: Theatrics
text: Swap with a minion in range.

name: Group Performance
text:
Swap with a friendly hero in range.
Move another one of you up to 2 spaces.

name: Magic Trick
text:
Push an unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces;
for every space the target moved, move this one of you one space in the opposite direction.

name: Wire Dancers
text: After you move, move another one of you up to 3 spaces.

name: Spectacle
text:
Swap with a minion in range.
May repeat once by another one of you, targeting a different minion.

name: Team Spirit
text:
Swap with a friendly hero in range.
Move another one of you up to 3 spaces.

name: Aaaand it's gone!
text:
Push an unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces;
for every space the target moved, move this one of you one space in the opposite direction.

name: Into Thin Air
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may remove one or more of you in play, including all of you.
_(If all are removed, you are not defeated. Respawn as normal.)_

name: Ransack
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: For each other one of you in radius, you may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Twin Strike
text: After you perform a basic attack action, another one of you may repeat it once, targeting a different unit.
